Posts.Content: Jul 19, 2010 03:42AM TryingtoStayCalm wrote: Everyone, Thanks so much for your advice and support.  1 mammogram, 2 sonograms, 1 10-day course of anti-biotics, 2 ob/gyn consults, 2 radiologist consults, and 1 surgical consult later...it was an infection.  I will follow up with the surgeon again in 4 months.  I can not thank you all enough for your help and support (especially when the rest of the world was sound asleep).  I will definitely make a donation to thank you all in some way for everything.  Thanks again!
Posts.Title: New - Would Appreciate Advice TryingtoStayCalm Kate33
